about_the_game:
DOKODA is an immersive hidden-object puzzle game set in 18th-century Japan. Players assume the role of Komaru, a recent recruit at the Museum of World Civilizations. Tasked with a crucial mission, Komaru ventures back in time to the Edo Period of Japan. His objective: to retrieve a variety of artifacts and give humanity a new hope for the future.

Somewhere in the not-so-distant future... Having exhausted all of the Earth's resources, the human race is on the verge of extinction. Komaru, a new employee at the Museum of World Civilizations, is given a critical mission to save mankind...

The Mission:
Travel back in time to Edo Period Japan and collect all the "Edo items" that will help humanity achieve sustainable development.
Scattered throughout Japan, the "Edo items" provide clues to the future path of human survival.
Can you find them all and become humanity's savior?

Features
- Travel to 12 locations in Japan and search for the items scattered throughout the country. Have fun learning about life during the Edo period!
- After collecting all the items for each mission, you will have to hold a press conference to announce your findings. Remember all the useful facts you've learned, and don't let humanity down!

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS 12 Monterey or later
  • Processor: Apple M1 or Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 4000 or higher
  • Storage: 170 MB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Mac OS 13 Ventura or later
  • Processor: Apple M1 or Intel Core i7
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel UHD Graphics 630
  • Storage: 170 MB available space

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 or higher
  • Processor: Intel quad-core 2.0 GHz or dual-core 2.6 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 560 or AMD Radeon HD 5700
